_sText:
It is form to play: 

1º  You will respawn with 1 hp (there isn't a  buy zone).

2º Press the buttons that are at your back and take your smoke grenade.

3º Throw it and try to hit  the enemy with it. If you hurt him he will die. 

4º  Go again to take other granait and avoid the enemy´s grenades with jumps and fast movements.
(Whatch out! the grenades can ricochet from the walls).

Other notes: 

-> Dont worry about the lag of  the smoke because the grenades will fall in room that is down the floor. And grenades can across the glass of the middle.

-> At 60" form the start of the round, the glass of the middle will break and you will be able to use the knife too.

-> Players will respawn with a knife and they can take smoke grenades.
